document.full_text: brandon knight scored 22 points and fourth-seeded kentucky gained the last spot in the final four, earning a matchup with the connecticut huskies.
document.title: east: kentucky 76, north carolina 69: kentucky beats north carolina in east final
lines_and_colors: brandon knight scored 22 points and fourth-seeded kentucky gained the last spot in the final four, earning a matchup with the connecticut huskies.
